MAIN.HERO_SUBTITLE: Premium Flooring Solutions for Every Home
MAIN.SERVICE_DESCRIPTION: We specialize in the installation of hardwood, carpet, tile, and more. Transform your home with our top-quality flooring options.
MAIN.MEDIA_DESCRIPTION_2: Luxurious carpet installation in a living room.
MAIN.MEDIA_DESCRIPTION_3: Custom tile work in a stylish bathroom.
MAIN.TESTIMONIAL_2: Our floors look amazing, highly recommend!
MAIN.TESTIMONIAL_3: Professional team with great attention to detail.
MAIN.CONTACT_DESCRIPTION: Get in touch with us for a consultation or to request a quote.
MAIN.TRUST_DESCRIPTION: Certified professionals with top ratings and trusted by many satisfied clients.

ABOUT.HISTORY_DESCRIPTION: Discount Flooring was founded with a mission to provide quality flooring at affordable prices. Over the years, we've grown to become a trusted name in the industry.
ABOUT.MISSION_DESCRIPTION: To deliver the best flooring solutions with exceptional service and value.
ABOUT.VISION_DESCRIPTION: To be the leading flooring company recognized for quality, service, and innovation.
ABOUT.CULTURE_DESCRIPTION: We foster a culture of respect, teamwork, and continuous improvement.
ABOUT.COMMITMENT_DESCRIPTION: We are dedicated to ensuring that every customer is satisfied with their flooring experience.
ABOUT.CSR_DESCRIPTION: We believe in giving back to the community and minimizing our environmental impact.

SERVICES.HARDWOOD_FLOORING_DESCRIPTION: Installation of solid hardwood floors, laminate, and parquet.
SERVICES.TILE_FLOORING_DESCRIPTION: Installation of ceramic, porcelain, and natural stone tiles.
SERVICES.VINYL_LINOLEUM_DESCRIPTION: Installation of vinyl, linoleum, and other synthetic flooring materials.
SERVICES.FLOATING_FLOORS_DESCRIPTION: Installation of floating floors and click systems.
SERVICES.CARPET_INSTALLATION_DESCRIPTION: Installation of carpets for residential and commercial interiors.
SERVICES.INDUSTRIAL_FLOORING_DESCRIPTION: Installation of durable floors for industrial or commercial environments.
SERVICES.HARDWOOD_REPAIR_DESCRIPTION: Repair of damaged boards, sanding, and varnishing.
SERVICES.TILE_REPAIR_DESCRIPTION: Replacement of broken or damaged tiles, grouting, and leveling.
SERVICES.VINYL_LINOLEUM_REPAIR_DESCRIPTION: Repair of damaged surfaces, bubbles, or detachment.
SERVICES.ANTIQUE_FLOOR_RESTORATION_DESCRIPTION: Complete restoration of aged or worn hardwood floors.
SERVICES.CARPET_REPAIR_DESCRIPTION: Repair of worn or damaged areas, stretching, and reconditioning.
SERVICES.WOOD_CLEANING_POLISHING_DESCRIPTION: Deep cleaning and polishing services to maintain shine and durability.
SERVICES.TILE_MAINTENANCE_DESCRIPTION: Joint and surface cleaning, application of sealers.
SERVICES.VINYL_LINOLEUM_MAINTENANCE_DESCRIPTION: Cleaning and protection to extend the life of the floor.
SERVICES.CARPET_CLEANING_DESCRIPTION: Deep cleaning services and stain treatment.
SERVICES.MATERIAL_SELECTION_DESCRIPTION: Help in selecting the most suitable flooring type according to needs and budget.
SERVICES.FLOOR_DESIGN_DESCRIPTION: Advice on patterns, colors, and combinations that enhance the space's aesthetics.
SERVICES.FLOOR_ASSESSMENT_DESCRIPTION: Inspection and evaluation of current flooring conditions to determine the best course of action.
SERVICES.CUSTOM_INSTALLATIONS_DESCRIPTION: Custom solutions for special projects or specific needs.
SERVICES.CUSTOM_PATTERNS_DESCRIPTION: Installation of floors with unique designs or custom patterns.
SERVICES.COMMERCIAL_RESIDENTIAL_DESCRIPTION: Specialized services for different types of properties.
SERVICES.QUALITY_WARRANTY_DESCRIPTION: Information on the warranties offered by the company for each type of service.
SERVICES.POST_INSTALLATION_MAINTENANCE_DESCRIPTIO: Offering periodic maintenance services to extend the floor's life.
SERVICES.CUSTOMER_SERVICE_DESCRIPTION: Information on how to contact customer service for inquiries or complaints.
